title: U.S. spy chief: Russia poised to disrupt midterm elections
text:
U.S. spy chief: Russia poised to disrupt midterm elections 12:17am GMT - 01:47 
Russia is likely to pursue more cyber attacks on elections in the United States, U.S. intelligence community leaders said on Tuesday, with just months to go before U.S. congressional and local elections in November.   
Russia is likely to pursue more cyber attacks on elections in the United States, U.S. intelligence community leaders said on Tuesday, with just months to go before U.S. congressional and local elections in November.  //reut.rs/2EColbA
